fatigue-plus.name: Fatigue+
fatigue-plus.description: Fatigue+ is a lightweight, immersive Minecraft mod that simulates sleep deprivation. Designed for Minecraft 1.8.9 (Forge) and built to work client-side only, this mod tracks how long youâ€™ve stayed awake and progressively makes your experience more difficult.

added: Sleep deprivation mechanic with progressive debuffs and death
Client-side mod for Minecraft 1.8.9 using Forge

display-api.name: Display-API
display-api.description: Display-API is a lightweight, dependency-free API for displaying BossBars, ActionBars, Titles, and Holograms in Minecraft 1.8.9 using native packets.

added: Support for Animated and Static Holograms via ArmorStands
changed: Optimized BossBar packet stability and entity removal logic
fixed: Crash when using ActionBar on empty player list
removed: GUI API (experimental GUI framework removed for stability)

added: BossBar API with color, style, update, and remove support
ActionBar API with duration and global sending
Title API with fade-in/out and subtitle
GUI API for basic in-game inventory interfaces
Hologram API including static and animated holograms

moderation.name: Moderation Plugin
moderation.description: A professional Minecraft moderation plugin featuring six punishment commands with multi-language support, Hypixel-inspired messaging, and persistent JSON data storage. Includes customizable language files and detailed staff notifications.

added: Multi-language system with English translation (more coming soon)
Hypixel-inspired message formatting with professional styling
Persistent JSON data storage for punishments and player settings
Detailed staff broadcast notifications with UUIDs, IPs, and ban IDs
Automatic punishment cleanup for expired mutes and temporary bans
Comprehensive punishment tracking with timestamps and staff information
